about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Sylvan Plyboard (India) Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of various wood products such as plywood, block board, flush door, veneer and sawn timber across various grades and thicknesses. The company has 223 Authorized Dealers present across 13 states.

The product range of the company consists of the following

  1. Plywood, Block Boards & Flush Doors
  2. Veneer
  3. Sawn Timber

The company's products meet the quality standards of the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS), including IS 303:1989, IS 710:2010, IS 2202:1999, IS 1659:2004, IS 5509:2021, and IS 10701:2012. The company has also received ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management System), ISO 14001:2015 (Environmental Management System), and ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety Management System) certifications for manufacturing and supplying Venner, Plywood, Block Board, and Flush Door.

The manufacturing facility of the company is situated in Hooghly, West Bengal.

The products are supplied to industries such as shipping, construction, real estate, interior decor, furniture, aviation, education, hospital, transport, banking, and government projects where plywood is needed for commercial and residential infrastructure.

As of June 2024, the company has a total of 817 employees at various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Sylvan Plyboard IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sylvan Plyboard IPO is a SME IPO of 5100000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹28.05 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹55 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on June 24, 2024, and closes on June 26, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sylvan Plyboard IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sylvan Plyboard IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sylvan Plyboard IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sylvan Plyboard IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sylvan Plyboard IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sylvan Plyboard IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sylvan Plyboard IPO opens on June 24, 2024 and closes on June 26, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sylvan Plyboard IPO?
faqs.answer: Sylvan Plyboard IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sylvan Plyboard IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sylvan Plyboard IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sylvan Plyboard IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sylvan Plyboard IPO will be done on Thursday, June 27, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, June 28, 2024. Check the Sylvan Plyboard IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sylvan Plyboard IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sylvan Plyboard IPO listing date is on Monday, July 1, 2024.
